page.title: 10WALSALL'S LEATHER TRADE
page.content: Walsall has been famous for leather goods for hundreds of years, particularly for Saddlery. To put our minds back on leather, our class walked around our streets and we found a few leather manufacturers, so we still keep up our reputation. We did a survey of the 'Yellow Pages' to find out how many leather manufacturers Walsall has. There are Leather garment mfrs 1 Leather goods mfrs 51 and merchants Saddlers and harness 45 makers Walsall Football Club's nickname is the 'Saddlers', there is a club in Walsall called 'The Saddler's Club' and Walsall's new shopping centre is called 'The Saddler's Centre'.
